title: Dans Le Vent
medium: gouache, ink, and watercolor on paper
provenance_text:
Wols (Alfred Otto Wolfgang Schulze) [1913-1951], Paris, France. Private collection; Gimpel Fils Ltd, London, England, in September 1963 [1]; purchased by Mr. Edward Haskell [1920-1988], Pittsburgh, PA, on November 12, 1963 [2]; Jane (Mrs. Edward) Haskell [1923-2013], November 1963 until May 28, 2013; partial gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1993, December 2005, and remainder bequest in September 2013.

Notes:
[1]. The work was on consignment with Gimpel FIls from an unknown owner; see copy of a letter from the gallery dated October 14, 1963 in curatorial file.
[2]. See invoice and receipt from Gimpel Fils for $1850 in curatorial file.  Mr. Haskell bought the work as a surprise for Mrs. Haskell's 40th birthday on November 24, 1963.
